data.title: Address Parser
data.solution:
import re

address = input()
parts = re.search('^([A-Za-z -]+) ([0-9]+ .*? (?:Street|Drive|Boulevard|Highway)) ([A-Za-z ]+) ([A-Z]{2}) ([0-9]{5})$',address)
print('|'.join(parts.groups()))
data.statement: Take a single line address and split it into its parts

testCases.title: Basics
testCases.testIn: Joe Smith 123 Main Street Somewhere AZ 12345

testCases.title: Basics
testCases.testIn: Terry Turnip 511 Black Drive Hell MI 43210

testCases.title: Getting Longer
testCases.testIn: Ray Paul Jones 1 Hill Top Boulevard Rockford CA 98112
testCases.testOut: Ray Paul Jones|1 Hill Top Boulevard|Rockford|CA|98112

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn: Jim Ray Rancher 511 Hill Top Drive Pleasantville FL 34112
testCases.testOut: Jim Ray Rancher|511 Hill Top Drive|Pleasantville|FL|34112

testCases.title: Crazy
testCases.testIn: Rick Press-Scott 134322 Five Mile Long Highway New York NY 03221
testCases.testOut: Rick Press-Scott|134322 Five Mile Long Highway|New York|NY|03221

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: Miles Cy-Cy 3131588 Two Short Deer Drive Los Angeles CA 98777
testCases.testOut: Miles Cy-Cy|3131588 Two Short Deer Drive|Los Angeles|CA|98777

data.constraints:
Name: Will consist of letters, spaces, and hyphens (-)
Street: Will always start with a number and end in one of the following [Street, Drive, Boulevard, Highway]
City: Will consist of letters, spaces, and hyphens(-)
State: Will always be two capital letters
ZipCode: Will always be five numerical digits (i.e. 12345)
data.inputDescription: <<Line 1:>> A single line <<address>> containing Name Street City State ZipCode
data.outputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> The parts of the address separated by pipe character (|)
Name|Street|City|State|ZipCode

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Take a single line address and split it into its parts
Input
Line 1: A single line address containing Name Street City State ZipCode
Output
Line 1: The parts of the address separated by pipe character (|)
Name|Street|City|State|ZipCode
Constraints
Name: Will consist of letters, spaces, and hyphens (-)
Street: Will always start with a number and end in one of the following [Street, Drive, Boulevard, Highway]
City: Will consist of letters, spaces, and hyphens(-)
State: Will always be two capital letters
ZipCode: Will always be five numerical digits (i.e. 12345)
Example
Input
Joe Smith 123 Main Street Somewhere AZ 12345
Output
Joe Smith|123 Main Street|Somewhere|AZ|12345
